statements: SELECT * FROM art_dealers;
SELECT art_piece_name, artist_name, price FROM art_dealers WHERE artist_name='Van Gogh';
SELECT DISTINCT artist_name FROM art_dealers ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT art_piece_name, price FROM art_dealers WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM art_dealers WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM art_dealers WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT artist_name, SUM(price) AS total_sales FROM art_dealers GROUP BY artist_name HAVING COUNT(artist_name) > 1 ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT art_piece_name, artist_name, price FROM art_dealers WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT * FROM art_dealers WHERE artist_name LIKE 'Vincent%' OR artist_name LIKE 'Pablo%' ORDER BY artist_name
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM art_dealers WHERE sale_date > '2022-07-01'
SELECT * FROM art_pieces WHERE artist_name = 'Van Gogh'
SELECT * FROM art_pieces WHERE price > 5000
SELECT * FROM art_pieces ORDER BY art_style DESC
SELECT artist_name, sale_price FROM art_pieces JOIN sales_history ON art_pieces.id = sales_history.art_piece_id
SELECT artist_name, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM art_pieces GROUP BY artist_name
SELECT * FROM art_pieces ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT artist_name, art_style FROM art_pieces WHERE art_style = 'Impressionism';
SELECT * FROM sales_history WHERE sale_price > 500 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT art_pieces.artist_name, sales_history.buyer_name FROM art_pieces JOIN sales_history ON art_pieces.id = sales_history.art_piece_id;
SELECT DISTINCT artist_name, art_style FROM art_pieces WHERE price < 1000;
SELECT * FROM ArtPieces;
SELECT name, artist, price FROM ArtPieces WHERE price > 5000;
SELECT id, name, artist, price FROM ArtPieces ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT artist, COUNT(*) AS total_art_pieces FROM ArtPieces GROUP BY artist;
SELECT ArtPieces.name AS art_name, SalesHistory.sale_price AS selling_price FROM ArtPieces JOIN SalesHistory ON ArtPieces.id = SalesHistory.art_piece_id;
SELECT * FROM ArtPieces;
SELECT id, name, artist, price FROM ArtPieces WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT ArtPieces.name, Dealers.name AS dealer_name, SalesHistory.sale_price FROM ArtPieces JOIN SalesHistory ON ArtPieces.id = SalesHistory.art_piece_id JOIN Dealers ON SalesHistory.buyer = Dealers.name WHERE SalesHistory.sale_price > 5000;

SELECT ArtPieces.name, Dealers.location, SalesHistory.sale_date FROM Dealers JOIN SalesHistory ON Dealers.name = SalesHistory.buyer JOIN ArtPieces ON SalesHistory.art_piece_id = ArtPieces.id ORDER BY SalesHistory.sale_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT artist, COUNT(*) AS total_art_pieces FROM ArtPieces GROUP BY artist HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_art_pieces DESC;
SELECT * FROM art_dealers;
SELECT dealer_name, location FROM art_dealers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT piece_name, artist_name, price FROM art_pieces WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT sale_date, dealer_id, sale_price FROM sales WHERE sale_price < 5000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT dealer_name, piece_name FROM art_dealers JOIN sales ON art_dealers.id = sales.dealer_id WHERE sale_price > 500;
SELECT * FROM art_dealers WHERE location='New York';
SELECT piece_name, artist_name, price FROM art_pieces WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT dealer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales INNER JOIN art_dealers ON sales.dealer_id = art_dealers.id GROUP BY dealer_name;

SELECT art_pieces.piece_name, art_dealers.dealer_name, sales.sale_date FROM sales INNER JOIN art_pieces ON sales.piece_id = art_pieces.id INNER JOIN art_dealers ON sales.dealer_id = art_dealers.id WHERE sale_price BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT dealer_name, SUM(sale_price) AS total_revenue FROM sales INNER JOIN art_dealers ON sales.dealer_id = art_dealers.id GROUP BY dealer_name HAVING total_revenue > 5000;
SELECT * FROM artist;
SELECT artist_name, artist_id FROM artist ORDER BY artist_id DESC;
SELECT piece_name, price FROM art_piece WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT gallery_name, location FROM gallery WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM contact WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT artist_name FROM artist WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT piece_name, price, sale_date FROM art_piece WHERE artist_id = 2 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT gallery_name, location FROM gallery WHERE gallery_id = 3;
SELECT art_id, sale_date, sale_price FROM sales_history WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM contact WHERE gallery_id = 4 AND artist_id = 5;
